Baltimore Heritage Tours
About Contact

Dec 5, 2015

Confederate Monuments in Wyman Park Dell

A walk around Wyman Park Dell and Charles Village to learn about ongoing review of Baltimore’s public Confederate monuments, the history behind these statues, and the complicated issue of public memory and public art.

Nov 7, 2015

Mount Vernon Place – Stories of Slavery & Emancipation

A walk around Mount Vernon Place highlighting the history of slavery and emancipation in Baltimore and Maryland.

Oct 16, 2015

Downtown Baltimore – Civil Rights and Urban Renewal

A walk around downtown Baltimore exploring the history of race, Civil Rights and changing ideas about urban renewal from the 1950s up to the present.

Oct 11, 2015

Black and Jewish Civil Rights Heritage by Bike

A bike tour exploring how black and Jewish Baltimore residents shaped the Civil Rights movement and the historic places of northwest Baltimore.
